entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [net6.0-ios+] Referenced project gets mistaken for an Apple framework when `GenerateDocumentationFile` is set to true #79500
  • NativeAOT on Alpine with StaticICULinking #79498
  • [Analyzer suggestion]: Indirectly incorrect parameter name of `ArgumentNullException` #79495
  • [NativeAOT] Crash with access violation instead of throwing System.NullReferenceException #79494
  • Mono AOT compiler does not prefix exported UnmanagedCallersOnly symbols with underscore when targeting iOS #79491
    8.0.0
  • Consecutive range checks are not combined #79490
  • NET 7: Calling `GC.Collect()` causes Access Violation exception (cx0000005) #79486
  • Optimization opportunities around Interlocked.CompareExchange #79485
  • NegotiateStream test deterministically fails locally on Windows 11 #79481
    8.0.0
  • Consider shipping `RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute` as a downlevel assembly #79479

Closed

  • Determine readlink result whether should be validated or not #73812
    8.0.0
  • Add support for compile time switches compatible for both JIT and NativeAOT #79488
  • [Android] Wrong exception HttpClient when SSL certificate is expired #79442
    8.0.0
  • How does the pointer encrease by double #79487
  • Test failure: Interop\\COM\\ComWrappers\\WeakReference\\WeakReferenceTest\\WeakReferenceTest.cmd #78945
    8.0.0
  • Aggressive GC: No Memory Decommit until 2nd GC (LOH only?) #78679

PullRequests

Created

  • Link static libstdc++ with libicuc in NativeAOT #79501
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Fix versions of the .NET 8 ILC package #79497
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Only align loops when optimizations are enabled #79496
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preparation for JIT\Regression test merging - assembly/file renames #79489
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Change RunningPublish property name to _IsPublishing #79483
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add code to create the different ILLink packages #79480
    area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0

Merged

  • improve symlink handling in Ping #79323
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Improve terser setup #79466
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Only create MethodTable optional fields when needed #79435
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix for COM Weakreference test failure under JIT stress. #79476
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Enable `runtime-coreclr jitstress-isas-avx512` pipeline on Linux #79417
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move the rearrange_uoh_segments call earlier so that distribute_free_regions can take them into account #79262
    area-GC-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: experiment with early liveness and use it for forward sub and last-use copy elision #79346
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.Throw helpers in more places #79460
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] reduce MethodImplOptions.NoInlining #79457
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Mono musl support #76500
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • This fixes emitGetVexPrefixSize to support detecting 2-byte prefix support #79478
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop producing and handling `ADDR` nodes #78246
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Optimize constrained calls made from gsharedvt methods. #79339
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Always set `addlDelta` to zero on x86 #79467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Export unmanagedcallersonly method symbols #79424
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • ifdef out unsupported Enum underlying types for nativeaot #79472
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • Delete unused FreeLibraryAndExitThread from PAL #79452
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Implement DynamicMethod.RTDynamicMethod.CreateDelegate. #79427
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Produce crashreport.json and use llvm-symbolizer to create stack trace #77578
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in the RegexCompiler and source gen #78927
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasi][wasm] Testing wasi build #79388
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [EXPERIMENTAL - will be reverted] Opt-in for msbuild server in CI #79444
  • Fix the multicore performance of mapping from an instruction pointer to a MethodDesc #79021
    area-VM-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet nuget sources add` or `dotnet nuget add source` ? #29480

PullRequests

Merged

  • extract common logging functionality into ApiSymbolExtensions #29379
    Area-ApiCompat, Area-GenAPI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Nominal and Collection Deconstruction #4082
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a blank line between a namespace and a class declaration when creating new item #65921
  • Consider displaying preview APIs differently #65915

Closed

  • Rename constantly failing in MAUI Apps #65397

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix line breaks between members when a property has an initializer #65924
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unnecessary discards #65923
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix several issues with CreateSpan support #65919
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65918
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65917
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add tests for CheckInvocationArgMixing #65916
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Move `CSharpMakeStatementAsynchronousCodeFixTests` to `VerifyCS` #65922
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Remove options that have the same editorconfig name #65800
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Minor cleanup in OptionStore #65450
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Simplify lsif generation concepts #65858
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade to .net 7 release version #65839
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix inline rename in MAUI #65818
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #65913
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/SharedSyntaxTrees #65914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #65912
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Pass cancellation token consistently through lsif generator. #65875
    Area-IDE
  • Add new API to easily tell if a node contains conditional preprocessor directives (without allocations). #65794
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix wrong symbol comparisons #65430
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move couple of tests to new testing library #63055
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add more test scenarios for symbol completion after scoped #65747
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Enable switch dispatch for is-expressions #65874
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update all linked files to have the same content object instances when updating the workspace's solution. #65885
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for draft of semantic tokens LSIF spec to LSIF generator #65860
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove code for cloning compilations for skeleton references #65842
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor HotReload throws `System.NullReferenceException` when using Serilog #45536
  • Implement IEndpointMetadataProvider on Result types like Forbid, Unauthorized, etc #45535
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #45534
  • Is it possible to start an Blazor project with custom headers? #45533
  • Programmatically acquire assets path for RCL assets or change the `_content` folder #45531

Closed

  • Please reinstate Microsoft.AspNetCore.SpaServices for .NET 6 LTS #44187
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: https, plaintext #45490
  • Perf regression: updates #45532
  • Support BindAsync Surrogates in Minimal APIs #45525
  • SignalR role base authorization not working #45530

PullRequests

Updated

  • Bump SDK to 8.0.100-alpha.1.22607.6 #44925
    area-infrastructure
  • fix trace id value, introduce traceparent #44680
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2064589 #44686
    area-infrastructure
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove obsolete classes #45466
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add compatibility suppression files to repo #45507
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Kestrel named pipes transport #44426
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
  • Harden IPv6Any error handling #45529
    area-runtime, Test failures

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update docker images to latest tags #3535

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Horrible performance/memory usage with CollectionView depending on size on screen #12013
  • maui blazor ios iframe #12012
  • iOS Email composing crashes App #12010

PullRequests

Created

  • CollectionView - Recycle DataTemplates when using template selector #12011
    area/collectionview 📃

Updated

  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • Update Development.md #12005
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #11949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update Editor.cs To solve HorizontalTextAlignment problem #10981
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing dotnet-ef not working on ubuntu 22.04 #29824
  • Set MaxLength ToJson column #29823

Closed

  • Is CommandCreating/Created/Initialized interceptor guaranteed to be invoked? #29813
  • How to capture warnings from DatabaseModelFactory #29726

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Allow underscores in identifiers again #29822
  • Allow underscores in identifiers again #29821

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29820
    Servicing-consider
  • Include table name for overrides in snapshot. #29819
